COMMITTEE ON APPROPRIATIONS
March 2, 1967
Mr. and Mrs. Henry G. Lee
418 - 23rd Avenue South
Grand Forks, North Dakota
Dear Friends:
Thank you very much for your letter of February
27 concerning the Educational Television Facilities Act.
I appreciated hearing from you and your views
are most helpful, particularly in view of the fact I have
had very little correspondence on this proposal, and
especially on the educational radio provision. From what
I know of it this appears to be a good idea.
Thank you again for your letter.
With kindest personal regards.
Sincerely yours
MILTON R. YOUNG
